description:
Final Fantasy: Mystic Quest is a simple, humorous RPG for the Super Nintendo. You travel across four continents,
linked in the middle of the world by the Focus Tower, which has been locked by four magical coins. Make your way to
the bottom of the Focus Tower, then straight up through the top!

ffmq-1.7-b1.description:
Targets the FFMQR 1.7 Beta 14, which has the following updates from v1.6:

- Doom Castle Shortcut changed to Doom Castle Access, with a new option to start with Mac's Ship freed.
- World Seed Supply option to choose the number of seeds in the item pool.
- Seed Vendors options.
- Option to disable local filler item brown boxes from resetting, meaning you can only obtain the item once.
- Option to disable an item duping bug.

Until FFMQR 1.7 goes live, you must use this website to patch your rom: https://dev.ffmqrando.net/Archipelago
ffmq-1.7-b1.title: FFMQR v1.7 Beta 1

ffmq-1.7-b2.description:
Universal Tracker support.

Map Shuffle data is stored in the server's `slot_data`, and downloaded by Universal Tracker to avoid querying the external API again.

Locations that would be in logic under expert logic mode but are out of logic with your setting will show as "glitched" locations.

Remember to patch your roms using https://dev.ffmqrando.net/Archipelago until FFMQR 1.7 goes live.
ffmq-1.7-b2.title: FFMQR v1.7 Beta 2

ffmq-1.7-b3.description:
- Stores uncompressed rooms data in slot data if msgpack is unavailable.
- If msgpack is available during generation but not for the player using the Univeral Tracker, tracking will fail. This should be a temporary issue until FFMQR 1.7 makes it in AP core, where AP will be bundled with msgpack.
ffmq-1.7-b3.title: FFMQR v1.7 Beta 3

ffmq-1.7-b4.description:
- Deprecated Progressive Formations option removed
- Enemizer Elemental option added
- World Seed Supply option is now a standard number range option instead of mirroring FFMQR's option choices exactly.
- HOTFIX: Fixes a bug with Shuffle Steel Armor, and adds a default option to World Seed Supply.
ffmq-1.7-b4.title: FFMQR v1.7 Beta 4
